messages.rank_none: {#server}> {#record}You must have {#highlite}{1}{#record} Local Records on this server before recieving a rank...
messages.pb_none: {#server}> {#error}You don't have a Local Record on this track yet...
messages.jukebox: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} was added to the jukebox by {#highlite}{2}
messages.jukebox_already: {#server}> {#emotic}You already have a track in the jukebox! Wait till it's been played before adding another.
messages.jukebox_dupl: {#server}> {#emotic}This track has already been added to the jukebox, pick another one.
messages.jukebox_repeat: {#server}> {#emotic}This track has been played recently. Wait a while before adding it again.
messages.jukebox_next: {#server}>> {#emotic}The next track will be {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} as requested by {#highlite}{2}
messages.jukebox_nextenv: {#server}>> {#emotic}The next track will be {#timelite}[{1}] {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} as requested by {#highlite}{3}
messages.jukebox_nodrop: {#server}> {#emotic}You don't have a track in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/jukebox Track_ID{#emotic} to add one...
messages.jukebox_add: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} is requesting {#highlite}{2}{#emotic} from {3}.{br}{#emotic}This will require {#highlite}{4}{#emotic} votes to pass. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
messages.jukebox_y: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} more vote{2} needed to add {#highlite}{3}{#emotic}. Type {#highlite}/y{#emotic} to vote yes.
messages.jukebox_pass: {#server}>> {#emotic}Vote Passed! {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} has been added to the jukebox.
messages.jukebox_notfound: {#server}> {#emotic}Track_ID not found - Type {#highlite}/list{#emotic} to see all tracks.
messages.jukebox_empty: {#server}> {#emotic}No tracks in the jukebox, use {#highlite}/jukebox Track_ID{#emotic} to add one...
messages.jukebox_help: {#server}> {#emotic}You have to include a Track_ID, e.g {#highlite}/jukebox 12{#emotic} - Type {#highlite}/jukebox help{#emotic} for more info.
messages.list_help: {#server}> {#emotic}Use {#highlite}/list{#emotic} first - Type {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} for more info.
messages.no_jukebox: {#server}> {#highlite}/jukebox{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.
messages.add_present: {#server}> {#highlite}Track already in server list, not added.
messages.add_presentjb: {#server}> {#highlite}Track already in server list, adding via jukebox.
messages.no_add: {#server}> {#highlite}/add{#emotic} is not currently enabled on this server.
messages.track_too_large: {#server}> {#error}Track is too large ({#highlite}{1}$i{#error} > 256 KB) - not added!
messages.vote_explain: {#server}>> {#vote}CallVotes disabled - see {#highlite}/helpvote{#vote} for info on chat-based voting
messages.vote_already: {#server}> {#error}A vote is already in progress. Wait for this to complete.
messages.vote_limit: {#server}> {#error}Already ran {#highlite}$i {1}{#error} {2} vote{3} for this track - that's enough!
messages.vote_start: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#vote} is requesting to {#highlite}{2}{#vote}.{br}{#vote}This will require {#highlite}{3}{#vote} votes to pass. Type {#highlite}/y{#vote} to vote yes.
messages.vote_y: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#vote} more vote{2} needed to {#highlite}{3}{#vote}. Type {#highlite}/y{#vote} to vote yes.
messages.no_more_replay: {#server}> {#vote}No more than {#highlite}{1}{#vote} replay{2} per track allowed!
messages.ask_admin: {#server}> {#error}Chat-based votes disabled - ask the currently available admin to
messages.karma_voted: {#server}> {#highlite}You have already voted for this track
messages.karma_remind: {#server}> {#karma}Remember to vote karma ({#highlite}/++{#karma} or {#highlite}/--{#karma}) for this track
messages.karma_require: {#server}> {#error}You need to finish this track at least {#highlite}$i {1}{#error} time{2} before voting!
messages.karma_nopublic: {#server}>> {#error}Public karma votes disabled, use $i{#highlite}/++{#error} or $i{#highlite}/--{#error} instead!
messages.official: {#server}> {#highlite}That is not a valid command on ANY server - just wait until the next track to become official.
messages.bootme: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#message} chooses to boot back to the real world.
messages.bootme_dialog: {#message}Thanks for playing, please come back soon!
